record.jsxtip: Exact number of characters allowed in a string

Minimum number of characters allowed in a string
Maximum inclusive value (the node value must be less than or equal to...)
Maximum exclusive value (the node value must be less than...)

Set to true to allow this node to be empty without being auto-removed
